text: A Letter for Evie is a 1946 American comedy movie directed by Jules Dassin and starring Marsha Hunt, John Carroll, Hume Cronyn, Spring Byington, Norman Lloyd, Pamela Britton, Donald Curtis, Esther Howard. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:1946 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Jules Dassin
title: A Letter for Evie
